title: Economic uncertainty affects tourism in Greece
text:

Marriage ruling Economic uncertainty affects tourism in Greece 
Greece, a country of great beauty and incredible historical wealth, has always been a popular tourist destination. But the financial turmoil that has hammered the Greek economy hasn’t spared the huge tourism industry.  Marty Adler of Bexley Travel said his clients have been avoiding Greece because of the financial crisis.  Already a Digital D subscriber?
